steps.title: How to Use the System
steps.subtitle: 3 simple steps to get comprehensive financial analysis

step1.title: Upload Your Statements
step1.description: Upload financial statements or trial balances in any format (PDF, Excel, Word, Images)

step2.title: Select Analysis Options
step2.description: Choose sector, activity, legal entity, comparison type, and number of years

step3.title: Click Analyze
step3.description: Get 181 detailed financial analysis types in seconds

bot.welcome: Hello! How can I help you with financial analysis today?

client1.name: Ahmed Mohammed
client1.content: A comprehensive and integrated system that helped me understand my company's performance quickly, accurately, and easily. It's a wonderful system that provides all types of financial analysis and comparisons at all levels, generating reports and presentations. I recommend it to all companies.

client2.name: Sarah Ahmed
client2.content: As a manager and financial analyst, I no longer need to waste time on long calculations for hours and weeks. All my work has become easier and my meetings more professional.

client3.name: Khalid Al-Omari
client3.content: As an investor, I can now make instant investment decisions and identify company stocks I want to invest in with confidence. Thank you for this smart system. Also, thank you for the free fair stock price calculator - it's really useful.

client4.name: Fatima Al-Zahrani
client4.content: In my work as an employee responsible for financing and lending operations, the system has helped me evaluate companies quickly and accurately, making financing and lending decisions quickly and wisely.
